# Global code ownership
# This file defines who owns the code in this repository
# See: https://docs.github.com/en/repositories/managing-your-repositorys-settings-and-features/customizing-your-repository/about-code-owners

# Default owner for everything in the repository
* @kumarpalsinh25

# Specific ownership for different parts of the project
# Android native code
/android/ @kumarpalsinh25

# Flutter/Dart code
/lib/ @kumarpalsinh25

# Example app
/example/ @kumarpalsinh25

# Documentation and configuration
*.md @kumarpalsinh25
*.yaml @kumarpalsinh25
*.yml @kumarpalsinh25

# Build and configuration files
/pubspec.yaml @kumarpalsinh25
/analysis_options.yaml @kumarpalsinh25
